title: At His Command
description: She had only seen him twice before, but he visited her in her fantasies. Strong, powerful, self-assured and supremely masculine, he was everything she could possibly want in a man. Every woman on her floor dreamed of being with him. But why would he want Pam? Of all the women he could choose in New York City she was surely the last. He was rich, handsome and powerful. She was nobody. She was nothing...... Until He Noticed Her...In this steamy tale of lust at the top of the Manhattan business world we join Pam, a typical young woman unsatisfied with her lot in life, as she finds herself tumbling head over heels into a torrid, taboo-breaking love affair with the dominant, sexy and mysterious Robert Foster.At His Command is the steamy opening story to the Dominated by the Billionaire series. The alluring sequel On His Orders is available to buy on Amazon right now. The Dominated by the Billionaire series is designed for readers hungry for more after reading E L Grey's groundbreaking 50 Shades of Grey. Within these pages you'll find tales of typical women taken on a wild ride by strong, confident men who always get what they want.
author: Aya Fukunishi
